Title: May the Giant Be with You
Plot: A wounded Agent Cooper has a vision of a giant who gives him several clues about the murder of Laura Palmer.  Shelly and Pete recover from the mill fire, but Josie and Catherine are missing.  Ben and Jerry Horne are not pleased with how the mill fire plan unfolded.  Leland Palmer's attitude changes with his hair color.  Albert returns to assist the wounded Cooper.  Donna gets a mysterious message about Meals on Wheels.  Dr. Jacoby recovers from his heart attack, but cannot remember who killed Ja
GuestStars: Victoria Catlin, Galyn Gorg, Stephen C. MacLaughlin, Charles Miller, Mak Takano, Jessica Wallenfels, Sandra Keye Wetzel, Alicia Witt, Mark Frost, Hank Worden
